entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 a.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
